ComicInfo.Summary:
Things that could go wrong on the tv show.
There are 2 stories. In the first, The White Spy is killed by guillotine-like falling blades. In the second, the epaulets on a coat kill the Black Spy.
Just what the title implies: a satirical look at the past year.
Various short satires of pop culture.
